(:action prepare
  ; Prepare a resource or area and update its status
  :parameters (?actor - agent ?target - entity)
  :precondition (and (at ?actor ?target) (not (prepared ?target)))
  :effect (prepared ?target)
)

(:action take ; General action for taking an item from a source
  :parameters (?agent - entity ?source - container ?item - object)
  :precondition (and (at ?agent ?source) (attached ?item ?source))
  :effect (and (not (attached ?item ?source))

(:action dip ; Dip an item into a substance to change its state
    :parameters (?p - player ?item - object ?substance - substance)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?item) (prepared ?item) (compatible ?item ?substance))
    :effect (dipped ?item ?substance))

(:action plant
  ; Plant a resource and update its state through various stages
  :parameters (?p - player ?resource - object ?l - location)
  
  :precondition (and 
    (at ?p ?resource)
    (or 
      (and (is_cutting ?resource) (not (dipped_into_rooting_hormone ?resource)))
      (and (is_cutting ?resource) (dipped_into_rooting_hormone ?resource) (not (planted ?resource ?l)))
      (and (prepared ?l) (not (planted ?resource ?l)))
    )
  )
  
  :effect (and 
    (or 
      (dipped_into_rooting_hormone ?resource)
      (planted ?resource ?l)
    )
